function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative influence of risk perception on travel intentions during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential decrease in tourist travel, both domestic and international, leading to economic losses in the travel industry","Mitigation":"Provide accurate and transparent information about safety measures and risk levels to help tourists make informed decisions","Technologies":"Travel advisories, real-time health and safety updates, digital health passports","People":"Serbian tourists, Indonesian travelers, Chinese tourists, South Koreans","Owner":"Government health agencies, travel industry stakeholders, tourism boards"},{"Description":"Influence of fear of COVID-19 on travel intentions and behavior","Impact":"Change in travel attitudes and behavior, leading to shifts in destination choices and vacation plans","Mitigation":"Promote health-protective vacation experiences, implement health safety measures, and enhance social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Virtual tours, contactless services, health monitoring apps, vaccination passports","People":"Indonesian travelers, Chinese tourists, German, Austrian, and Swiss travelers, South Koreans","Owner":"Travel industry, hospitality sector, government tourism ministries"},{"Description":"Unwillingness to participate in rural tourism and preference for health safety in accommodations due to COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced interest in rural tourism and increased demand for health-focused accommodation options","Mitigation":"Enhance health safety measures in rural tourism, promote health-conscious hospitality services, and communicate the safety of rural destinations","Technologies":"Health-focused accommodation certifications, destination health ratings, travel safety apps","People":"Chinese travelers","Owner":"Rural tourism operators, hospitality industry, destination marketing organizations"}]}
